title: What is the interpretation of seeing a valley in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of dreaming about seeing a valley in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi? To see digging a valley in a dream indicates the death of a relative or friend, and seeing a valley indicates the passage of difficult stages and the flow. Of water in the valley indicates overcoming adversity and difficulties and a safe and stable life, and seeing the valley whose waters have become muddy and polluted, this is not good for anxiety, sadness, experiences and difficulties, and seeing the valley. Full of water indicates very good health and a long life, so follow us. Dream of seeing a valley by Ibn SirinSeeing a valley in a dream symbolizes good deeds, closeness to God, and many charitable deeds. Interpretation of the dream can also indicate traveling far but it will require a lot of fatigue and suffering. The valley that appears in a dream indicates victory over enemies and their machinations. Dreaming of a dry valley in a dream indicates distress, imprisonment, and illness. The interpretation of seeing a dug valley in a dream indicates the death of someone dear to the dreamer. Seeing a green valley and interpreting a dream of walking in the valley indicates stability and prosperity. The dream Seeing a swampy valley is an unpleasant vision and is a sign of bad luck, poverty and illness. Dreaming of seeing a valley for Nabulsi. A dream of a great valley as narrated by Imam Nabulsi indicates money and knowledge. Seeing falling into a valley in a dream is evidence of achieving goals and achieving what a person wants to achieve. A dream of swimming in a valley indicates money and knowledge. A valley in a dream indicates good news and good luck and success in work. Seeing green valleys in a dream is a sign of passion, love and harmony. A dream to see a valley for single people. A dream of an unmarried woman drinking clean water from a valley in a dream is a sign of goodness and justice for her and the fulfillment of desires. It may mean Dreaming of crossing a valley, getting engaged and marrying a suitable person. Dreaming of a valley full of abundant water is a sign of health, well-being and longevity. To dream of a valley of single people and warm water is a sign of stress and sadness. This is how a dream of turbid water in a valley appears in the dream of an unmarried woman, which is what It often indicates problems, diseases, and depression. If a single woman sees that she is in a beautiful green valley, this indicates a prosperous future, a wonderful life, and the achievement of multiple successes. Seeing water flowing in the valley means victory over enemies, achieving goals, wealth, and prosperity. Seeing crossing the valley indicates engagement or marriage , because it indicates overcoming difficulties. Seeing a valley of warm water indicates stress, sadness, and many obstacles. Dreaming of seeing a valley for a married woman. Seeing a valley walking in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her closeness to God, her righteousness, and her obedience to her husband and family. The interpretation of a dream of falling into a valley without Any harm in a married woman’s dream indicates a great benefit that she can get from a close person. But the dream of seeing a pure valley in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the husband’s promotion in his work and an increase in her family’s livelihood. To see that you are crossing a valley means that you have gone through difficult stages and that you will endure many Of marital responsibilities. Seeing fresh water

title: All interpretations of seeing paper in a dream by Ibn Sirin and major commentators

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing paper in a dream Paper is one of the most valuable things in our lives and has many uses and we often see it in dreams, knowing that it can appear in the vision in different colors and sizes and through the specialized Egyptian website we will provide you with countless interpretations about seeing paper in a dream, follow what The meaning of paper in a dream follows: There are many visions related to the paper symbol in a dream, which we will list for you in the following lines: A person’s dream that he eats many pages of books and scientific references indicates that he will be interested in various fields of science and become passionate about them, and perhaps he will be one of the prominent figures. In one of the different branches of science. Science and Knowledge. The most prominent interpretations of the dreamer’s vision of owning many papers in a dream is that he is a conscious person and has great knowledge and academic experience. The vision is praiseworthy, as the paper appeared in the dream and it is intact and undamaged, and all the sentences written on it are clean and free of dirt such as mud and so on. If one sees that he is writing Some words on a sheet of a notebook, then this is a sign of lawful profit, provided that the notebook is not in bad shape or its leaves are incomplete. The dreamer’s signature on a sheet of paper in a dream is a sign of his waking signature on the marriage document, the inheritance that he will receive, or the like. The interpreters said that seeing the signature on the papers is a sign that the dreamer is a strong person personally and mentally, and this strength will soon appear in the dilemma of what will befall him, and making the right decision at the right time means that he will be able to resolve matters without fear or disturbance. If the widow dreams that the white paper In front of her was empty and nothing was written on it, so she took a pen and began writing comforting phrases and words of encouragement. Seeing this is a positive sign that the death of her husband happened. It does not make her break, and she will fight her circumstances, and through her strength and resilience in the face of previous circumstances, she will find that life has many things that she will do. Make her happy, so the dream is a sign of a new marriage or the coming of happy events that will change her life standards for the better. If the dreamer sees in his dream a folded paper and signs it, the scene indicates that he will make a waking effort and in return will achieve great success because of the money, time and effort he sacrificed. To achieve his ambition and desired goals. If the dreamer holds a pen in his hand and prepares to write on paper, then the dream expresses cover and avoidance of misery and drought. There is no doubt that the dream indicates that the dreamer is a person who has material intelligence and knows the best ways to keep money. And not to waste it on trifles, and thus he will be able to save himself in times of crisis and regain his financial strength again. If the dreamer works in a private company or a government department and dreams that he is in his office with papers in his hand and he was signing them and that his handwriting is beautiful and the papers are clean, then the dream has great signs. That professional ambitions will lead to reaching and perhaps moving to a greater job through promotion. Seeing paper in a dream. The dreamer appears in a dream holding in his hand a piece of paper.

title: Interpretation of blue clothes in a dream A blue dress in a dream

preview.html: We explain to you the blue dress and wearing a dark, light blue shirt. They buy blue clothes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Single, married and pregnant women. The meanings of the appearance of the color blue in your dream about clothes and apparel. Blue in the dress is anxiety and depression. The color blue in dreams is evidence of the presence of problems and fears, but the color blue in a man’s clothes may indicate To fatigue and exhaustion, not anxiety, and it may indicate profit and success if the intended clothes are new and clean. Blue clothes in this context can bring us closer to the idea of ​​ambition and hope, because the sea, which is a symbol of livelihood, is blue, as are the sky and nature. There is nothing blue inside except the sky and the sea. The blue color of the dress in a dream can express the clarity of the mind and the thoughts it creates, and light blue is perhaps the most favorite shade of blue in the dream. No dark blue or indigo. Ultimately, a man who saw that his clothes were blue in a dream can be optimistic about this vision, because it can boost his self-confidence. Its significance in a man’s sleep can be praiseworthy, unlike a woman. Blue clothes in a single woman’s or girl’s dream Blue clothes are not welcome in dreams because they express distress or problems, especially when they are dark or “gloomy.” If the girl’s dress is beautiful and new Its color is blue, so it represents renewed hope in matters in which the girl previously suffered failure in the past. A blue jacket or dress can represent travel or exile, and if the girl in her dream is happy with what she wore or bought blue clothes, then this is a positive sign because the feeling or emotion in The field of dream interpretation goes beyond the symbol. And color. If a married or pregnant woman sees that in a dream she is wearing a beautiful blue dress, this is most likely her interpretation of nourishment. And of course she hates the color blue in worn, old and torn clothes. For a pregnant woman, a blue dress is praiseworthy and expresses her desire to have a child without the female. Her dress, coat or other clothing Blue Dress Vision YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing the Word of God in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the words of God in a dream or dreams by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam al-Sadiq for married people, pregnant women, men and women. What is the interpretation of seeing the words of God in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing the words of God in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is a sign of good character and high morals, and the married man must facilitate He has his affairs and solves his problems. A young married woman who sees the word of God in a dream announces that his happy marriage is approaching. See also: Interpretation of seeing the name of Joseph in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the name of God in the sky in a dream: Seeing the name of God in the sky in a dream is a sign to bring happiness, blessings and abundant goodness to the Lord. What Interpretation of seeing the name of God in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing the name of God in a dream by Ibn Shaheen indicates God’s response to the dreamer’s prayers, and God’s fulfillment of what He wants and dreams of. Seeing the name of God in a dream indicates a resourceful approach, an increase in livelihood and health, and the emergence of positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Such as a happy marriage or a brilliant success in his life. See also: The interpretation of seeing the words of Muhammad, the Messenger of God, in Paradise in a dream. The interpretation of seeing the name of God Almighty in a dream for one girl: Seeing one girl saying in the name of God Almighty in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate the success of her romantic relationship and the approaching Her happy marriage. An unmarried woman who sees the name of God in a dream shows her intense love for goodness and her behavior. What is the interpretation of seeing the remembrance of God in a married woman’s dream: Seeing a married woman in a dream remembering God, signifying the opening of the doors of livelihood for her husband and the stability of their married life. Seeing a married woman in the name of God In a dream, it states her high morals, her intense love for her husband, and her righteous upbringing. See also: The interpretation of seeing the pronouncement of “There is no god but God” in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the name of God in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq: Seeing the name of God in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq is a sign of the dreamer’s approaching death, or his high status. Among men, or his travel to a country in search of a legitimate way of life. Seeing the name of God in the sky and building a place with it is a sign of deteriorating health and imminent death. What is the interpretation of seeing the name of God in a dream for a man: Seeing the name of God in a dream for a man is a sign of the strength of his intelligence and great ambition that brings him joy And happiness. Seeing the name of God in a dream shows a feeling of fear and anxiety about the future, pressures of life, or religious extremism and following the teachings of his religion. Seeing the name of God Almighty in a dream is an indication of the many misfortunes and pains in the life of the discerning witness. Seeing the name of God in the sky in a dream is one of the promising visions that indicate a good dreamer. And his happiness. See also: Interpretation of seeing God’s name pronounced in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing God’s name in a divorced woman’s dream: Seeing God’s name in a divorced woman’s dream is a sign that opens the doors of livelihood for the dreamer, may God be pleased with him. An absolute view of the sky and seeing God’s name is a sign of obtaining a lot of money and a lot of money. Of livelihood. Seeing the color of the sky changing and the appearance of the name of God Almighty is a sign of good changes in the dreamer’s life, such as achieving his goals and starting a new stable life. Seeing the absolute name of God in a dream indicates...

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about cleaning someone else’s house by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning someone else’s house is one of the dreams that has many interpretations, good and sometimes bad, depending on the type of dreamer, whether male or female, his situation in the dream, and how he feels, was he happy or sad? We will learn about all the interpretations related to this topic below. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning someone else's house Seeing someone in a dream cleaning someone else's house symbolizes goodness, blessings, and good news that he will enjoy in the coming period. Seeing the dreamer cleaning someone else's house indicates a close marriage with a good young man and a good personality. Also, a married man's dream of cleaning someone else's house in a dream indicates that his wife will soon become pregnant, God willing. A person's dream of cleaning someone else's house in a dream indicates that he is trying to prove himself in many matters and be himself. Seeing a woman cleaning someone else's house in a dream is a sign that her situation will improve soon, God willing, and she will get a lot of money and many good things in the coming period. Seeing a woman cleaning someone else's house in a dream means that she helps others for free, which makes her popular with people. When the dreamer sees in a dream that she is cleaning her brother's house, this is a sign that she supports him at this time because he is going through some problems. Interpretation of dreams about cleaning someone else's house by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin interprets seeing cleaning other people's houses in a dream as the dreamer wants to get away from his family and become independent. Seeing yourself cleaning someone else's house in a dream symbolizes kindness And the blessings that the dreamer will enjoy soon. In general, cleaning someone else's house in a dream is evidence of the dreamer's generosity and love for helping people in times of crisis and sadness, God Almighty willing. Seeing yourself cleaning someone else's house in a dream is a sign of achieving the goals and wishes that the dreamer has been planning for a while. Seeing a woman cleaning someone else's house indicates that she will soon give birth to a child. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning someone else's house for single women Seeing a single girl cleaning someone else's house shows that she loves helping people for nothing. Seeing an unmarried girl in someone else's house and cleaning with a broom symbolizes the patient in her family who will recover, God willing. Seeing a girl cleaning her brother's house in a dream is a sign that you are facing crises and overcoming them as soon as possible, God willing. Cleaning someone else's house in general for a girl who is not related is evidence of the good that will happen to her in the near future, God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl cleaning someone else's house symbolizes that she will get rid of the sadness and distress that she was going through and that was disturbing her life. Seeing an unmarried girl cleaning someone else's house in a dream indicates her marriage to a young man who has good moral and religious commitment and improving her circumstances Her life. But in the case of sweeping the house for others, this is a sign of the problems and disputes that she faces during the period, but they will be overcome, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is cleaning someone else’s house, the dream may indicate that

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing an octopus in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an octopus in a dream: Sometimes we dream of certain types of fish, sea animals, and other animals, and we search a lot for an explanation for them and what they appear, such as an octopus in a dream with different colors and a different nature of a dream, and this leads to multiple interpretations and explanations depending on the nature of the dream and the nature of the dreamer who dreamed. The octopus in a dreamThe octopus is an animal. A marine animal with three hearts and eight legs, it is also a very dangerous and predatory animal, distinguished by its intelligence and cunning and has different colors such as white, black and red, and it can also vary in sizes, so its presence in dreams can indicate different aspects depending on its size and color. God through a relative, friend, or perhaps a loved one. Some commentators also believe that there is an interpretation of goodness that shows the strength of God’s character and his ability to take responsibility and make decisions. Also, if the dreamer sees himself transformed into an octopus, this indicates a major and radical change in his life or The beginning of a new project in his life. If a single person sees an octopus chasing him in a dream, this indicates his strength, patience, and morals. If he is married and an octopus attacks him in a dream, this means that he has an opponent who wants to kill him. Or kill him. It is also good news for a married man who will not give birth to his wife while she is pregnant in the near future. Seeing a calm octopus in a man’s dream indicates a new job or obtaining an inheritance soon. Seeing an octopus in a dream of an unmarried man beating him or killing him indicates his victory over his rivals. Interpretation of a dream about an octopus in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a dream about an octopus in several ways: If a person sees an octopus in a dream and it generally increases in size, this indicates to him that his money will increase later, to the poor that he will become rich by God’s will, and to those concerned that worry and anxiety will be removed. And the patient's distress will go away. If a man sees that his wife brings him an octopus in a dream, this means that his wife will become pregnant soon. Also, seeing an octopus in a dream indicates the strength of the viewer’s character, the correctness of his opinion, and his ability to solve the problems he will face, as well as his mental intelligence and balance of personality. If A man saw an octopus in a dream and ran away, so this indicates the presence of a competing enemy, but the dreamer will triumph over him in the end. Seeing the same person caressing an octopus in a dream means that he will triumph over his opponents easily and that he will make good decisions during this time. Whoever was single and saw that he was He caresses an octopus in a dream, this indicates that he loves a girl and will marry her soon. If one dreams that he hits an octopus in a dream and hurts it, this means that if he is imprisoned, he will be released from his prison, heal the sick person and overcome his illness. Whoever sees that he is trying to kill an octopus in a dream He cannot do that, as this vision shows his many problems and his complete inability to find a solution to them due to his lack of awareness and awareness of these aspects of the problems and his life. Lack of wisdom, then he has to try again by changing the way he thinks about the problem and the way he solves it, he may succeed and overcome it. If the dreamer sees an octopus in a dream

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about cleaning Ibn Sirin’s house and cleaning the floor in a dream?

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning the house in a dream: Many women and girls dream of cleaning their homes from dirt and dust. Young men and women may also dream of this vision. Because the details of this dream are many, we decided on an Egyptian website to present all the details with appropriate interpretations for each detail, and we will show you the interpretations of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, Nabulsi, and Miller in the following paragraphs. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a houseCleaning a house in a dream can indicate many signs. First evidence: A person From time to time he wants to change his life and break the routine and monotony in it, so he will think for a long time about finding a group of ideas through which he feels pleasure, and the dream of cleaning the house indicates that the dreamer will implement what came into his head soon. Perhaps a single or married person can think of an idea. Project and specialization in this project will be according to their interests. This means that if the dreamer is more interested in designing clothes or food than any other idea, he will conduct a feasibility study on it and then start looking for strong implementers to ensure a profit from it. The idea that came to the dreamer’s only mind may be the idea of ​​traveling and stopping her life in the place where she lives In it to move all her ambitions elsewhere and start trying to achieve them, knowing that these ideas will. Soon inhabiting the dreamer's mind may be individual or collective thoughts. Meaning that he can do it alone or a group of close people or friends can participate in it. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website on Google, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading translation scholars. The second evidence: Seeing the arrangement and cleaning of the house As a whole, it is a good vision, but if the dreamer collects dust from the ground in the vision, then this is a metaphor for deceiving others, and the manifestations of deception are many, such as: deceiving others and seizing their property, dealing with people with the intention of benefiting from them, and not benefiting them and standing by them. The third sign: Symbol The speed and slowness of cleaning the house in the vision is one of the strong symbols in this dream, and Ibn Sirin explained that if the dreamer sees his house in a dream in a shabby condition and cleans it in a quick period of time, this is a sign of the dreamer’s keenness to be vigilant in implementing a large number of agreements and projects in the future. The shortest possible time, either the duration of the cleaning period may indicate the opposite, or it means that the dreamer is suffering and fighting for him. Bad life conditions to enjoy comfort and a life free of pain. Fourth sign: Sweeping rooms in a dream differs in meaning from sweeping the toilet, kitchen, or garden of the house. The factors are: The first factor: Exorbitant expenses. As a man among us, no matter how affordable his financial situation is and how abundantly he lives, if he does not preserve his money, he will lose it all and be surprised that all the money he has accumulated as a result of the toil and misery of years ago is the result of lack of wisdom and chaos. The second factor: Many successful businessmen have provided some important advice for fighting bankruptcy or property damage, and it was

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a jug in a dream for a man and a woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the pitcher by Jaafar Al-Sadiq. Jaafar Al-Sadiq explained: See the pitcher. Ali in the dream refers to a woman, servant, or maid who has eleven faces and can indicate reform, the strength of religion, longevity, and an increase in life, money, and inheritance that the dreamer acquires from the side of women. Interpretation of seeing the pitcher of Nabulus. Nabulsi will interpret the vision of the pitcher in a dream. About repentance after sinning and committing sins. And if the dreamer is a pregnant woman, seeing a jug in a dream means that God will bless her with a male child. Seeing a jug in a dream may indicate a boy who is aware of secrets. Whoever sees in his dream that he collects jugs, then this person is good and does many good deeds. He will intercede for him and admit him to Paradise. The jug can indicate that the sword is one of its meanings. Seeing the jug in a dream may indicate the high status of the dreamer or the person holding the jug in the dream and may indicate laughter, laughter and playing. Miller’s interpretation of seeing a jug in a dreamMiller’s interpretation of seeing the jug in a dream indicates this To improved mood, peace of mind, excellence in work and success in it, just as broken jugs in a dream indicate the loss of friends. When seeing jugs filled with a clear liquid, this indicates that there is someone who cares about your attention and your friends will gather to make you happy. Whoever sees in his sleep an empty jug, this indicates that he is moving away. About friends and close people as a result of his bad behavior. Broken jugs in a dream indicate failure in the field of work and illness. Whoever sees in his sleep that he is drinking wine from a jug, this indicates that he is a healthy person who enjoys all areas of his life and that he is an optimistic person in life. If you eat a disgusting jug filter, this It indicates pessimism and disappointment, followed by optimism and joy. Interpretation of seeing Ibn Shaheen in a dream A jug Ibn Shaheen Al Dhahiri interpreted seeing a jug in a dream for a servant and the younger the longer his service period. Pouring water from a jug indicates the loss of friends and the severance of the relationship between people who have been in a relationship with each other for a long time Seeing a jug standing on the ground in a dream indicates a quarrel between spouses. Other interpretations about seeing a jug in a dream. Who knows? An iron jug in a dream, this indicates marriage to a good person recognized by a relative or in the field of work. A dirty jug in a dream indicates a treacherous person who is not... Trustworthy hurts people. As you can see, the jug is clean and beautiful. It indicates that the dreamer is a good person and provides help to others. Here, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing a jug in a dream. Anyone who has any vision and wants to interpret it, we receive your comments through the site and we will give you the explanation as soon as possible. Available time.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a camel in a dream from Ibn Sirin, and the interpretation of a dream about a camel haunts me

preview.html: A camel in a dream is one of the visions that indicate fatigue and exhaustion as a result of stress and psychological tension, but some interpretive scholars have interpreted this dream as good, and the symbols and connotations of this dream may differ depending on the viewer. A camel in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a camel is evidence of the marriage of a single person. If the dreamer is a student of knowledge and sees in a dream that he is riding a camel, this indicates success and achieving the best grades. A camel in a dream for married people is evidence of stability and a happy married life. A camel in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Dreaming of a camel in a dream indicates a good woman, and if the dreamer is a young, unmarried man and sees in his dream that he is raising a camel in his home, he will soon be blessed with a good wife and a full half. From his religion. When the dreamer sees camels pouring a lot of milk in the mosque, this indicates that an entire year was full of good things, and calm down. Seeing a man milking a camel and the milk containing fresh milk that tastes good is one of the visions that indicate an abundance of money and many good things. As for the dream of riding a camel In a dream, it is evidence of marriage to a woman who obeys in all the affairs of his life. The dream interpretation website on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write. The Dream Interpretation Website on the Internet. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. The camel in a single woman’s dream. The camel in a dream An unmarried girl is evidence that she will soon marry a wealthy, well-off young man, which will make her live in a standard of living full of prosperity and freshness. As for seeing a girl’s camel going in the opposite direction, this indicates financial losses and her falling into many problems. A camel in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates... Fulfilling some desires that she has been searching for for a long time. A camel in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married camel in a dream shows the burdens and responsibilities that one bears, and it is one of the visions that suggest that one is going through many difficulties, the desire not to continue, and the tendency to withdraw from any psychological pressure. Seeing a beautiful camel in a dream indicates satisfaction with what is allocated and thanks to God Almighty for his many blessings. A married woman’s dream of riding a camel in a dream is evidence that she is preparing for some important events that will pass in the coming period. A camel in a dream for a pregnant woman. A camel in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of The difficult period that she is going through and her fear of childbirth, and the dream of a camel in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the nearness of childbirth and she must prepare and prepare psychologically. If a pregnant woman sees a camel in her dream, this indicates her fears that she will suffer in the coming period and she must confront it with all her strength. A camel in a divorced woman’s dream is a vision. A divorced woman riding a camel in a dream is evidence of her maintenance with a righteous husband who will be hers in place of the previous one. As for a divorced woman who sees that she is milking a camel but does not do so. She has a lot of milk, then she will be blessed with abundant money and many good things. As for a divorced woman seeing a camel, this indicates that she will be exposed to some problems and difficulties between her and her family. A camel in a man’s dream. Seeing a man in a dream

title: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant, so what is the interpretation of the dream?

preview.html: I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant. The dream of childbirth can be seen by many women, and this is of course one of the dreams that does not concern dreamers. Through this article, we will explain the most important interpretations and clear important indications so that the dreamer does not get confused between many different interpretations. I dreamed that I gave birth to a child while I was pregnant. Many of the most important experts in the science of interpretation said that seeing that I gave birth to a child while pregnant in a dream means that she will have an easy and simple pregnancy period during which she will not suffer from any health problems. Or crises that affect her health or the health of her fetus, and that God will stand by her and support her until she gives birth to her child well, God willing. Many of the most important scholars of interpretation have also confirmed that my vision that I gave birth to a child in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she does not suffer from pressures or disturbances that affect her psychological state at that time. However, if the woman suffers from many pains and aches due to her pregnancy and sees in her dream that she gave birth to a boy, this indicates that she lives a family life without serious problems and difficulties. I dreamed that I gave birth to a boy while I was pregnant with Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that dreaming that I gave birth to a child during pregnancy indicates the positive changes that will occur in her life and will completely change it for the better in a big way and that she does not suffer during this period from any problems or financial crises that affect her personal life during these periods. The respected researcher Ibn Sirin also confirmed that my vision that I gave birth to a child during pregnancy indicates the death of all the difficult stages and problems that greatly affected her personal life and psychological state in previous periods. To dream that I gave birth to a child during pregnancy indicates the stable life that she lives At that time in her life, she does not suffer from problems or disputes between her and her partner that affect their relationship. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type a website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Many of the most important experts in the science of interpretation also confirmed that seeing that I gave birth to a boy when I was married in a dream is a sign that God will fill her life with many blessings and many good things that will make her happy. Praise be to God for his many blessings. As many prominent jurists have explained in interpretation that seeing that I gave birth to my son during my marriage and I am asleep, this indicates that she has received a major promotion in her field of work due to her diligence and great mastery in her work. Many of the most important interpretation experts say that my vision that I gave birth to a child and saw his organs in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she will face many difficult stages that will exhaust her physically and psychologically in the coming period.
